Из минусов комьюнити и обнуление рангов, пока возвращаешь свой встречаешь много "интересных личностей". Бесконечная загрузка, вылетание при загрузке из катки. Разок застрял в текстуре и ничего не мог сделать.

Interesting game ,Bad Experience.

まあ初期の頃に比べたらものすごくよくなったよ。バグがあるからクソゲーと言ってるやつたくさんいるけど、それも昔に比べたら少なくなったほうだよ。板の枚数も丁度よくなってる。そしてライトも弱くなった。前は誰でもきめられるライトだったけど今は滅多に決めることができない故、ライトスタンができた時の爽快感がすさまじい。え？ライトカチカチ屈伸煽りがうざいだって？だったら首頷きまくってムーンウォークして一緒に遊べばいいじゃん。え？試合後に「ez」って打たれる？だったら同じくチャット欄に「s〇x」って打てばいいじゃん。あくまで個人的な意見だけど、キャンプされたら通報ボタンを！煽られたら通報ボタンを！、などを一々言ってるやつが一番うざい。
結局何が言いたいのかというと

其实免费体验一下，虽然国内已经禁播两年，电脑换了，就买了，顺便买了3个dlc，但是体验是真的差
1，免费体验是没发现，但是买了后 ，什么无网络连接，初始化失败，选人进房一直加载，等等，最坑的是用任务管理器杀进程，结果还得卡上那么一会，鼠标基本无法移动，内存暴涨，warframe 我顶多是六字真言加上登录换网，这个是直接掉。
2，匹配别人延迟基本都是200+，基本没有两位数。关键很多还都是国人，移动 100m 就这么不行吗。基本所有游戏都被吐槽过土豆服务器，关键别人家延迟也没这么大，我知道是和房主点对点连，但是就算是国人，延迟依旧很大，我就很难理解。
Игра прожила свои годы. РС карта парашная удалите её из игры. Куча токсиков. Обещали пофиксить ранги нет на пепле 1 попадаются красные ранги. Вообщем не рекомендую.

Категорически не рекомендую игру, полный дисбаланс, все на стороне выживших, карты завалены палетами, окнами и кустами / постройками в которых очень легко спрятатся от маньяка, с точки зрения игры за маньяка ты играешь ради удовольствия выживших, они побегают по кругу, повеселятся и убегут без проблем. (речь про ранги ниже 10-ых) 

Говорят что есть маньяки которые могут контрить таких выживших, типа медсестры, но уверяю вас это не так, в некоторых играх при удачной карте, да у вас будет шанс забрать 2-3 выживших, но это если очень повезет с не слаженной командой выживших и картой, в остальных случаях вы будете развлекать и в итоге проигрывать.

Игра чрезмерно дисбалансна и генерирует слишком много отрицательных эмоций за что совершенно не стоит платить реальные деньги.

П.с.: Если играть за выжившего, то это совсем другая игра, мансите от маньяка, приседайте после каждой палетки что бы того бомбило от того что он ничего не может вам сделать, и выходите в ворота клацая фанариком, что бы показать как сильно вы доминируете над маном, в игре все для этого есть!

Игра в самом начале показалось довольно увлекательной.Страх перед тем,что за тобой гонится маньяк или же наоборот ты должен успеть убить всех выживших.
Но огромный минус со стороны людей,с которыми ты играешь.Если не собрать именно свою команду,то рандомно нету смысла играть.Купив второй раз игру,не смогла даже поиграть с кем-то,просто нету людей или не грузить,понятия не имею.
Игра не плохая,но нужно много доработок и больше возможностей,а не просто бегать друг за другом и чинить генераторы.
Советую посмотреть обзоры,прежде чем покупать игру.

It's a very cool and unique game, and I've played it a lot recently. However, that time I've put in gives me the experience to point out the massive flaws in this game.

1. When I play with friends, it's slightly common for a killer to see us all pop into a lobby at the same time, and then disconnect once we've started loading into the map. We then lose our offerings because of a killer who doesn't want to face a  coordinated team of 4.

2. Lag. There's no real fix for this one because this game is a peer-to-peer connection kind of game. I very rarely ever find a game with double-digit ping. For me in NYC, I usually find games with around 120-150ms ping.

3. The Flashlight is almost completely useless. Unless you find yourself with an incredibly slow killer, you'll probably go down before the Killer is blinded. This is especially true for the faster Killers in this game.

4. The Saboteur perk. Sure, it was incredibly OP in the beginning, since you could break literally all the hooks on the map except for the basement hooks. Now after the nerf however, it's completely useless. Hooks can magically unbreak after a certain period of time? How does that make sense? There are better ways to solve this problem, and making hooks regen is not one of them.

5. There's something wrong with the tapping mechanic when one is hooked. Sometimes a person struggling on the hook will just die, even when tapping furiously on the space key. Something is just off here.

6. This game is heavily skewed in the Killer's favor. This critique, to me, is the biggest one out of all the ones I've listed. Some perks allow a Killer to see a Survivor's aura for long periods of time. 'Long' in this game can mean just a couple seconds, but it does not take long at all to go from one end of the map to the other, as these maps are actually quite small.
Monsters like the Hillbilly, Nurse, Spirit, and the alien looking thing are able to teleport, making it easy to catch up to highlighted survivors. Shape and Legion can easily close distances by just simply being fast. The combination of long distance detection and fast mobility can make this game too difficult to figure out and enjoy, even when coordinating with three other friends. Nurse's Calling and BBQ and Chili are two perks in particular that are near impossible to beat when paired together.

Overall, if you're specifically looking for a highly suspenceful online co op game, this is it. But if you're just looking for a game in general to maybe play with friends some of the time, you'd probably be better off with something else.

EDIT: Patch 2.5 just came out! They buffed a few survivor stuff. But they also buffed Killers, like a lot more.
EDIT: It's January 2020! Happy New Year! Anyways, the Killers are still kinda OP. In some games, I feel like there's just little to no hope of getting out alive. I only hop on this game now with friends just to pass the time. It's hardly that exciting any more. If me and my friends had found something cool to play instead of this game, I really wouldn't have put so many hours into it.
EDIT: August 2020! I hope you've been doing well all things considered. This game is still pretty bad honestly. The probability of finding highly ranked killers is pretty high. Things in my opinion are still heavily skewed in the killers' favor. With a seemingly dwindling player base, there's never been less reason to purchase this game.

simply the best in its genre , if you hate it then the genre is just not for you. It is not 100% balanced , it slightly favors survivors when playing with multiple friends , still have workarounds against SWF. Takes load of times to learn the game , if your not willing to invest time in playing both survivor and killer you will most likely get stomped. The skill ceiling is quite high at beginning , but tons of guides that you could watch to understand the game mechanics. Joining the game as a new player is quite rough , you would start very behind of the top end players but there are multiple ways to catchup to them , many guides out there to help in that regard.
Add a compass? Maybe a text chatin game? And make it to where you can bring your party back with you.

Pros : 
- Really fun game where you can play as a survivor in a team OR as a killer and hunt that team down
- game mechanics are pretty fun and balanced
- Fun perks system for survivors and killers, giving us something to play and grind for
- Different killers with different fun abilities
- Many cool spooky maps
- game development is doing great adding new characters and perks and killing bugs

Cons :
- bad hosting system (killer has to be the host)
- Takes so long to find a game as a killer most of the time (up to 10 minutes)
- Players disconnect a lot (because there's no good punishment system)

overall the game is so much fun and I recommend it

P.S. I've updated my review recently because most of the issues I mentioned were fixed within a year

Alright lads, you wanna know why you should get this game? WEL THATS TU BADD!!! What i AM going to tell you, is why you SHOULD get this ga-uh wait a minute....okay nvm :( Eny-who. So. Right. Okay, so, you just get home from a STE-RESSFUL day at work, or maybe a bit of a rumbux with the missus...you know what you wanna do? THATS right, play some facken DBD. Cause when you're pissed off at the world, seething, boiling....cooking if you will, there's nothing better to do, then play a game of ring around the fucken rosie, whether you're playing killer....""K I L L E R"", or survivor (God). 

But you're probably wondering, "hey dick-head, what else does this curse-i mean game have to offer?!?!?" WEYULL, for one, each bitc- killer has a special ability that they can use to alter the course of the game and the god-awful chases within them. Both survivors AND babies.....wait, NOT babies? oh okay, i mean killers, each have their own ways of dealing with each other. Survivors and their toxic fucking 360 spins, killers and their sicc moon-walking, and the one and only....PALLET  L O O P S. There are also perks that the killer and survivor can use, Hex: Ruin for example, which is used to slow teh game down "JuSt a Lil biT !?!?", and facken...ugh....dear i say it....D E C I S I V E   S T R I K E  *commits suicide* 

AND if those survivor perks weren't butt-facken annoying already, they've also got these lil thangs we call "items" or as baby-killers have come to call them...weapons [ :( times infinity ]. "what exactly ARE these items, dickwad?!?!" well that is a HORRIBLE question. We don't talk about it in front of the baby-killers, at least :/ Well first off, you got flashlights, used for blinding the killer like a true asshole, aswell as some SPICEY moonwalks. Then you've got the medkits, pretty much fortnut healing in a nutshell (or alternatively you can use that one negro gals "self-care" perk to heal yourself, killers take 2 hits to down you btw after that they can hook you, which takes 3 hooks for you to die, sometimes 2 if you struggle too much or dont get sav- wait a minute....why TF am i telling you this? check out a fackin community guide or some shit....focken parasite >:(  anyway, you also got toolboxes, which you can use to gen-rush the killer lyke the true toxic survivor you are >:( and uhh, maps....well, we dont talk about those :(

And last but not least, you got the killer weapons/abilities and addons. Both of which are annoying as fack for survivors (but not killers >:) SPECIALLY shit ones like Hex: NOED or...ugh...Hex: Devour Hope :( feelsbadman, don't even get me started on huntress' lullaby and Hex: Ruin :( But if you're wondering what makes the killers abilities annoying for you baby survivors??? thats right, killers have adapted to your toxic 360's and jukes, well....most of them have, baby killers exist, it's a fact we can't deny, BUT we respect them regardless...okay survivors? >:( 

Cause i know a couple of guys and gals that have hard time playing killer, or just the game in general, and then in the post-G chat, they get some friendly ass comments :( This is why i love and hate the DBD community, cause getting nice survivors is a bit of r'n'g, you never know what you're gonna get, but regardless, you know you're always going to get the most common reward, in this case; toxic survivors that talk shit. Something i've noticed tho, is that most survivors will find any and i mean ANY excuse to put you down and class you as a "shit" killer. Even if ya play fairly :/ Heck, i gave the last guy the hatch once (alternative escape if the doors arent open), and in the post-game chat he scolded me for being a "soft-pansy that lacked any true talent" XD what a bloke, wouldnt ya say?

And on the other side of things, there's the toxicness that killers possess, be it camping or tunneling. Camping...well....we won't get into that :( and tunneling...yeah, pretty much goin after the same poor sod time and time again, thats all ima say :(. Tell you what, killers can get up to some pretty facken toxic shit aswell :D

But all in all you got a  G U D  game here, despite the amusingly autistic chats, a very, VERY,  V E R Y !  ! ! friendly community -_- and all round good sportsmanship (guy that keeps sandbagging me and dropping the killer off right at my fucking doorstep!!) But whot do i have to say about all this? Well.....all i can say....is....."I tHiNk wE Did A pRetTy gOoD JOb sO fAr !?!?"     

:D
10/10 would refund again.

그리고 두판째 살인마매칭으로 한국인생존자 4인팟을 만났다
나는 첫판과 똑같이 4인팟 한국유저들을 잡으러 돌아다니고있었다
그런데 아무리 찾아도 안보였다 발전기는 3~2 씩줄어가고 0개가되서
탈출구가열렸다 4인큐 한국유저들은 탈출구가열리자 본성을 들어냈다
4인큐 한국유저들은 생존마였다 탈출구 근처에서 나를보자 4명은 나를 농락하며
빵댕이를 흔들고 내가던지는 손도끼를 다피해가며 따라오라고 4명이 손짓해서 따라가니깐 전부 탈출구로 튀였다
나는 그때서야 사람들이 데드바이라이트 평가에서 생존마 생존마 거리는지 알았다.
